prevention: Avoid close contact with infected person

vaccination_schedule.covid-19: 1st dose after 12 years of age, 2nd dose after 3 months, booster after 9 months
vaccination_schedule.tetanus: At birth, 6 weeks, 10 weeks, 14 weeks, booster at 4-6 years

first_aid.burns: Cool the area with running water, avoid ice, cover with clean cloth
first_aid.cuts: Clean with water, apply antiseptic, cover with bandage
first_aid.fainting: Lay the person down, elevate legs, loosen tight clothing, keep them calm
first_aid.snake bite: Keep the person calm, immobilize the affected limb, seek medical help immediately, do not suck venom

health_tips: Drink at least 2-3 liters of water daily
Exercise at least 30 minutes a day
Eat a balanced diet with fruits and vegetables
Avoid smoking and excessive alcohol consumption

odisha: Dengue outbreak in Bhubaneswar - avoid stagnant water
jharkhand: Malaria cases rising in Ranchi district

health_programs.pulse_polio: Every year in January and July, free polio vaccination for children under 5
health_programs.national_tb_program: Free TB screening and treatment at government hospitals

faq.can_dengue_spread_person_to_person: No, dengue spreads only through mosquito bites
